Once again - this is important. earthworm eggs in the usual way does not destroy. They are protected by a special shell that can be destroyed only by specially created insecticides.
In total, there are three of the species. The earthworm lays three types of eggs. To destroy the eggs of each species should be used some insecticide . They say that if you use the wrong type of insecticide, it will cause internal metamorphosis in the egg, which will lead to a change of its kind ... and full restoration of health.
And know that egg can only be destroyed after three applications of insecticide. As you can see, the destruction of the earthworm eggs - hard work, which requires well-coordinated teamwork.
Keep this in mind.
